system.effect: The attack cooks off the target's ear, leaving him with a partially burned stump of cartilage. He is Deafened for [[1d5]] hours (or until he receives medical attention).

description.value:
Energy Damage to Head (Severity 3)

The attack cooks off the target's ear, leaving him with a partially burned stump of cartilage. He is Deafened for [[1d5]] hours (or until he receives medical attention).
